Key Arguments: The proposed bill is a threat to democracy and freedom of speech.
The repercussions of implementing the bill incorrectly could be severe.
Existing laws should already cover criminal use of misinformation.
Legislation should not control mass debate and difference of opinion.
Excessive control is open to abuse and is dangerous.
Notable Quotes: I am concerned that Proposed Bill is a threat to Democracy & Freedom of Speech.
Too much control is open to abuse & very dangerous.
Hopefully Freedom of Speech & Democracy will not be lost to Overreaching Legislation.
